text: Some Like It Hot is a 1959 American comedy movie starring Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Pat O'Brien, Jack Lemmon and George Raft, and directed by Billy Wilder. It is seen by some as a remake of the 1951 German movie, Fanfaren der Liebe. (Michael Logan wrote the story for the version) The movie is set in 1929. It has been remade for the stage twice (in 1972 and 2002). It was ranked at Number One on the AFI's 100 Years... 100 Laughs list and fourteen on the AFI's 100 Years... 100 Movies list. == Other websites == * * * JenFlick.com Review * Roger Ebert's Great Movies review Category:1959 comedy movies Category:1959 crime movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American movie remakes Category:American musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:MGM movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder
title: Some Like It Hot
